column4: is there any safe to install a gnome shell session on ubuntu? it's appealing me more and more...
*safe way

get 10.10, it's the last working version of ubuntu
i'm a gnome2 die-hard actually

what with 'get 10.10'?! last... (?!)
which part did you not understand?
i'm running 11.04 just fine, classic session, elegant gnome
really?
I tried it, and just about everything is broken
the graphics failed when doing a dist-upgrade, too
everything broken in natty?
gosh
well, people are having really varying experiences with 11.04 as far as i can see
I'm probably switching to gentoo or something
hm... can't say anything about gentoo, never digged that
my natty's doing a good job
good for you

once, I think
